t: Five leading U.S. commercial brands of moist snuff in 1994: assessment of carcinogenic N-nitrosamines - PubMed
s: The three leading U.S. snuff brands (Copenhagen, Skoal fine cut, and Kodiak; making up 92% of the U.S. market) showed not only high levels of pH, nicotine, and unprotonated (free) nicotine, but also high concentrations of the strongly carcinogenic TSNAs in comparison with the fourth and fifth ...
